chapters.title: Chapter 6: Doorways
chapters.info: Halvar, p. 135 (113)—The First of Mayene around 300 years ago. He gave the Tairens the twisted doorway ter'angreal that leads to the land of the Aelfinn as a sign of goodwill. He was betrayed by the High Lords only a few years later. See also sur Paendrag Paeron, Berelain.
